name: Coffee Break (itch) (DerKancso)
description:
The city is in ruins. The space inside the office is changed. The light are flickering and dangerous vending machines wander around. This can mean only one thing: you opened the chaos dimension...

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move
SPACE or I to toss (shoot)
R or O to interact
ESC to go back to the menu
(If you died, then SPACE to restart)

Softwares I used: Unity (Personal), Paint.NET, Visual Studio
Font I used: Copyright 2011, The VT323 Project Authors (peter.hull@oikoi.com)
